title: Orthodox Tensions in Jackson
body: Chris Pollak narrowly won a Jackson Township Council seat, with most Orthodox Jewish voters backing his opponent Al Couceiro amid sharp rhetoric and deep divisions in the community.

title: Rabbi Yosef Mizrachi Defends Jihadist
body: Rabbi Yosef Mizrachi and Orthodox Jews in NYC defend a jihadist at an anti-Zionism protest outside City Hall, sparking controversy.
